thread.title: NANCY
thread.title_full: Discounted Designer Fabrics reviewed by NANCY

author: NANCY
title: NANCY
text:
This review is almost 3 months late, but that's because I just today received my furniture back from the upholsterer. So it's my first real look at what I ordered! (G070 Grey Distressed faux leather)
Well, I am very pleased! It looks completely real and even feels real; better quality than I could have expected.
I wouldn't hesitate to order from DDF again. They were easy to order from, definitely security conscious, and very helpful when it turned out I needed additional fabric. They were always courteous!
Thanks DDF :)
